QueryResult.text: SELECT DISTINCT FA.CODE, NLS.NAME, LANG.ID AS LANGUAGE_ID, LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE, FA.LAST_UPDATED_DATE FROM FIN_ATTRIBUTES FA, CMN_LOOKUPS_V NLS, CMN_LANGUAGES LANG WHERE FA.PLANNING = 1 AND NLS.LOOKUP_TYPE = 'LOOKUP_FIN_GROUPING_ATTRIBUTES_CAPTIONS' AND NLS.LOOKUP_CODE = FA.CODE AND NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE = LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE AND LANG.IS_DW_ENABLED = 1
